headline: Is Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Pricing Looked At Differently After Recent Share Price Recovery
summary: If you are wondering whether Occidental Petroleum is attractively priced right now, you are not alone. This question often comes up with the stock frequently in the spotlight for value focused investors. The shares last closed at US$47.24, with returns of 1.2% over 7 days, 10.6% over 30 days, 11.5% year to date, 0.9% over 1 year, a 21.1% decline over 3 years, and 87.5% over 5 years.
